TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EnvelopedSignatureWriter extends System.IdentityModel.DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter
Public NotInheritable Class EnvelopedSignatureWriter Inherits DelegatingXmlDictionaryWriter

Docs.summary: Wraps a writer and generates a signature automatically when the envelope has been completely written. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks By default the generated signature is inserted as the last element in the envelope. This can be modified by explicitly calling the <xref:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureWriter.WriteSignature%2A> method to indicate the location inside the envelope where the signature should be inserted.

MemberSignature.Value: public EnvelopedSignatureWriter (System.Xml.XmlWriter innerWriter, System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials signingCredentials, string referenceId, System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer securityTokenSerializer);

.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.XmlWriter innerWriter, class System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SigningCredentials signingCredentials, string referenceId, class System.IdentityModel.Selectors.SecurityTokenSerializer securityTokenSerializer) cil managed

public: EnvelopedSignatureWriter(System::Xml::XmlWriter ^ innerWriter, System::IdentityModel::Tokens::SigningCredentials ^ signingCredentials, System::String ^ referenceId, System::IdentityModel::Selectors::SecurityTokenSerializer ^ securityTokenSerializer);

Docs.param: The signing credentials to be used to generate the signature.
The reference ID of the envelope.
The token serializer to use to serialize the signature KeyInfo.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteEndElement() cil managed

Docs.summary: Closes one element and pops the corresponding namespace scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the last element of the envelope is written, the signature is automatically computed over the envelope. If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureWriter.WriteSignature%2A> method was explicitly called, the signature is inserted at the appropriate position inside the envelope; otherwise, it is inserted at the end of the envelope.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void WriteFullEndElement() cil managed

Docs.summary: Closes one element and pops the corresponding namespace scope.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the last element of the envelope is written, the signature is automatically computed over the envelope. If the <xref:System.IdentityModel.EnvelopedSignatureWriter.WriteSignature%2A> method was explicitly called, the signature is inserted at the appropriate position inside the envelope; otherwise, it is inserted at the end of the envelope.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void WriteSignature() cil managed

Docs.summary: Sets the position of the signature within the envelope. Call this method while writing the envelope to indicate at which point the signature should be inserted.
